@allure.title("Test Add Business Owner") def test_add_business_owner(): with sync_playwright() as p: browser = p.chromium.launch(headless=False) page = browser.new_page() page.goto("https://dashboard.impactoapps.com/business-owners") print("Clicking 'Add Business Owner' button...") page.click("button:has-text('Add Business Owner')") page.wait_for_timeout(2000) # Increased wait time try: page.wait_for_selector("h5:has-text('Add Business Owner')", timeout=5000) except: page.wait_for_selector("text=Add Business Owner", timeout=5000) print("Modal appeared!") page.fill("#name", "Automation User") page.fill("#email", generate_random_email()) page.fill("#countryDialCode", "+880") page.fill("#phone", "01712345678") page.fill("#dateOfBirth", "1990-01-01") #
